slides.title: Welcome to your Cardano Foundation Identity Wallet
slides.description: A secure and easy-to-use tool that allows you to manage your digital identity and control your personal data

slides.title: Securerly manage your digital identity
slides.description: Securely manage your digital identity and share your personal data with confidence

slides.title: Take control of your personal data
slides.description: Say goodbye to the days of handing over your personal data to third-party companies

slides.title: Verify your identity with ease
slides.description: Verify your identity for various online services, without sharing unnecessary personal information

slides.title: Experience the power of decentralized identity
slides.description: As a decentralized identity platform, you take control of your digital identity and your personal data

enterpasscode.title: Create a passcode
enterpasscode.description: Create a passcode to secure your wallet and to continue setting up your seed phrase

startover.label: I cant remember, can I start over?

paragraph.top: Think of your secret recovery phrase as a safety net for your identity. If you ever lose your phone or switch to a new wallet, this phrase will help you recover your identity.
paragraph.bottom: It's important to keep these words safe and sound! Store them in a secure location, like a password manager, and remember to never share them with anyone.

overlay.text: Press the 'view' button when you're ready to see your seed phrase. Remember to make sure nobody is looking!

alert.text: Have you double-checked you've copied your seed phrase correctly?

termsandconditions.text: I have read and agree to the <0>{{clickableText}}</0>.

paragraph.top: Please select each word in the order it was presented to you.

alert.text: Sorry, the seed phrase you have entered is incorrect!
